metadata.source: Web search + AI trend analysis November 2024

ideas.title: AI Agents Now Automating 4× Faster Than Humans
ideas.description: Neon reveals 80% of their serverless Postgres databases are now created by AI agents, provisioning at 4× the human rate with <1% error rate
key_stats: 80% of databases created by AI agents
ideas.business_value: Demonstrate 4× speed advantage with real data
ideas.content_angle: Contrarian: Automation isn't helping anymore, it's replacing

ideas.title: AI Agent Market Exploding: $5.1B to $47.1B by 2030
ideas.description: AI agent market projected to grow at 44.8% CAGR, from $5.1 billion (2024) to $47.1 billion (2030), with $3.8B raised in 2024 alone
ideas.business_value: Show massive market opportunity and timing
ideas.content_angle: Authority: Position as understanding market dynamics

ideas.title: Automation Officially Overtakes Augmentation in Claude Usage
ideas.description: Claude API usage data shows automation (49%) has surpassed augmentation (47%) for the first time, marking shift from AI assistance to AI autonomy
key_stats: API users significantly more likely to automate
ideas.business_value: Validate automation-first approach with Anthropic data
ideas.content_angle: Data-driven: Show the tipping point has passed

ideas.title: DoorDash: 0 to 35,000 Automated Calls in 6 Weeks
ideas.description: DoorDash deployed AI agents for customer service, scaling from zero to 35,000+ automated calls in 6 weeks with 94% accuracy
ideas.business_value: Show rapid deployment + high accuracy combination
ideas.content_angle: Transformation: From zero to enterprise scale in weeks

ideas.title: Agentic AI: Full Autonomy Without Human Intervention
ideas.description: New agentic AI models have complete autonomy to analyze environment, set goals, plan, execute, and adapt actions without human intervention
ideas.business_value: Explain the shift from assisted to autonomous AI
ideas.content_angle: Future-focused: What comes after current AI agents
